channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sterling File Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sterling File Gateway

item.title: CVE-2021-20485|2024-08-03T17:45:44.228Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.0.3 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 197667.

item.title: CVE-2021-20481|2024-08-03T17:45:44.318Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 197503.

item.title: CVE-2021-20372|2024-08-03T17:37:24.239Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 could allow a remote authenticated user to cause a denial of another user's service due to insufficient permission checking. IBM X-Force ID: 195518.

item.title: CVE-2021-20375|2024-08-03T17:37:24.153Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 could allow an authenticated user to intercept and replace a message sent by another user due to improper access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 195567.

item.title: CVE-2021-20563|2024-08-03T17:45:44.773Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.0.3 could allow a remote authenciated user to obtain sensitive information. By sending a specially crafted request, the user could disclose a valid filepath on the server which could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 199234.

item.title: CVE-2021-20484|2024-08-03T17:45:44.179Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.0.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 197666.

item.title: CVE-2021-20561|2024-08-03T17:45:44.350Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 199230.

item.title: CVE-2021-20584|2024-08-03T17:45:44.624Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by improper access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 199397.

item.title: CVE-2021-20473|2024-08-03T17:37:24.133Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway User Interface 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 does not invalidate session after logout which could allow an authenticated user to impersonate another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 196944.

item.title: CVE-2021-20376|2024-08-03T17:37:24.153Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 could allow an authenticated attacker to enumerate usernames due to there being an observable discrepancy in returned messages. IBM X-Force ID: 195568.

item.title: CVE-2021-20489|2024-08-03T17:45:44.393Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 197790.

item.title: CVE-2021-20552|2024-08-03T17:45:44.323Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 6.0.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 199170.

item.title: CVE-2023-47714|2024-08-02T21:16:43.653Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.9, 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.2.3, and 6.2.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271531.

item.title: CVE-2023-47714|2024-06-04T17:26:44.843Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.9, 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.2.3, and 6.2.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271531.
